description.displayText: Rikeya came a bit earlier than what we needed her for, which wasn't a problem. It was only a few minutes early, which actually gave us enough time to speak to her, let her know a few things and she could meet our little boy before we left. While we were out, she updated us on how he was doing. Our baby is 4 months old by the way, so of course we needed someone we could trust who also has experience with newborns. When we got home, he had a belly full of milk and was already in bed.
